item.title: Version 1.2.17 (Build 20251230.1)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Smart Forward Delete using Accessibility API

Replace simple isTypingMidSentence check with AX API to detect if

there's actually text after cursor before sending Forward Delete.

Changes:

  • Add hasTextAfterCursor() using AX API to check cursor position
  • Add shouldSendForwardDelete() with smart detection logic:

1. Check fixAutocomplete setting

2. Check isTypingMidSentence flag

3. Use AX API to confirm no text after cursor

4. Fallback to allow for apps without AX support (Spotlight, etc.)

  • Log fixAutocomplete setting in AppDelegate
  • Add version info to debug log header

This prevents Forward Delete from accidentally deleting text when

cursor is in the middle of existing text, while still working for

autocomplete suggestions at end of text.
